name: INSTAKILL
description:
INSTAKILL is a super fast paced 2D top-down shooter. You are a murderer who, instead of the death penalty, was transferred to a virtual space where a certain Warden forces you to use all your combat skills to compete with other prisoners for a chance to get freedom.

-Play as three characters with their own unique abilities and weapons.

-3 unique enemy types

-12 adrenaline songs from Aim to Head

-3 hardcore levels with 20 enemy waves
